about_the_game: Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so get a mooove on in Pen Pals!
detailed_description: Things are going HAYwire down at the farm! Corral a herd of particularly round barnyard friends back into the pen. When two matching animals bump into each other, you'll find an even larger animal in their place. Things get crowded quickly, so get a mooove on in Pen Pals!
name: Pen Pals Demo
